channel.title: Need to mass pwn on ur server- Learn how to- make urself invincible and more
channel.description:
I have a few things that u can do to make urself a mass pwner- ~Make urself Invicible. ~Make urself a 1 hit everything. ~Make urself almost never hit. ~MAKE URSELF A GOD!
1. To make urself invincible go to your server folder in winrar and go to the "characters" folder. Then go to your name and open the notepad document. Then go down to the skills and go to where is says "character-skill3 = (lvl) and change the lvl to 9999 which will give u 9999 health and when it looks like it goes down it will spring back up to full.
2. For 1 hit u do the same thing as 1. but change character-skill2
3. is same but defence 4th skill
4. Is same but do it for every skill[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 09:29:36 PM[/size][hr]Any questions ask me on msn- Scootkid@hotmail.com

erm, shouldn’t this go in the tutorials or server develpment section… and, for defence you need a tutorial to make defence bonuses work which i have only seen 1 of and it’s not noob friendly.

item.title: Need to mass pwn on ur server- Learn how to- make urself invincible and more
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

I have a few things that u can do to make urself a mass pwner-
~Make urself Invicible.
~Make urself a 1 hit everything.
~Make urself almost never hit.
~MAKE URSELF A GOD!

  1. To make urself invincible go to your server folder in winrar and go to the “characters” folder.
    Then go to your name and open the notepad document.
    Then go down to the skills and go to where is says "character-skill3 = (lvl)
    and change the lvl to 9999 which will give u 9999 health and when it looks like it goes down it will spring back up to full.

  2. For 1 hit u do the same thing as 1. but change character-skill2

  3. is same but defence 4th skill

  4. Is same but do it for every skill[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 09:29:36 PM[/size][hr]Any questions ask me on msn-
